name: Obstacle 4
description:
Obstacle 4.1 update - added volume adjustments along with minor glitch patches.

Obstacle 4.0 is finally released! Important things to note are that I added a wait button. If you press space in game then all the red squares will move without you needing to move. As well there are 2 new difficulties! Ludicrous and Impossible.

Thanks to my good friends Prince Tanis and Creeper Blast for making the music for this game! https://www.twitch.tv/princetanis https://twitter.com/Creeper91973693

IF YOU PUT IT TO FULL SCREEN AND CANT SEE THE FULL BOX THEN SWITCH TO SMALLSTACLE

RECORDS AT EACH DIFFICULTY

  • Easy - 178 (Kate)
  • Normal - 164 (Skylor)
  • Hard - 76 (Kate)
  • Extreme - 47 (Kate)
  • Ludicrous - 29 (Kate)
  • Impossible - 16 (Kate)
